Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits rental car companies and used car companies from renting, selling or leasing vehicles that have been recalled due to safety risks
Summary: Prohibits rental car companies and used car companies from renting, selling or leasing vehicles that have been recalled due to safety risks.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting rental car companies and used car companies from renting, selling or leasing vehicles that have been recalled due to safety risks
